<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这是一款免费的双语对照网页翻译插件，支持 PDF 翻译（保留排版），视频双语字幕翻译（Youtube, Netflix），EPUB 电子书翻译，支持人工智能 AI 翻译大模型（OpenAI (ChatGPT)、DeepL、Gemini(Bard) 等）。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">开箱即用，功能上其实和我们常见的一些网页翻译软件差不多。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">但是主打一个“沉浸式”。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">是真的“沉浸式”，它会通过智能识别网页主内容区域进行双语对照网页翻译，降低对原网页的“侵入性”，从而有更好的外文网页翻译和阅读体验。</p>

<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">Learn About 是 Google 基于 AI 研发的一个互动式学习网站。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">在介绍 Learn About 我先岔开一句，之前 Google 也出了另外一个基于 AI 的产品：NotebookLM</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">当时我还写了一个文章：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/zK40OQNA3Tj9KxN6gpS6zQ" style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-weight: bold; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-radius: 0; margin: 0; padding: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word" rel="noopener nofollow">《我宣布，这是今年我最喜欢的笔记类AI应用。》</a></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">NotebookLM 的使用模式是你喂给它资料，然后问它问题，它给出的回答就一定是基于你给的资料来的。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">使用它的前提是你有一堆资料。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">而 Learn About 解决的问题是“你想学，但是你啥都没有”，这个更加常见的问题。</p>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 20px 0; padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 249, 249, 1); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto"><span style="display: none; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"></span>
<p style="text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; margin: 0">https://learning.google.com/experiments/learn-about?src=signup</p>
</blockquote>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112153438.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">哦，对了，如果你要使用这个网站，首先要掌握相对科学的上网姿势，此外，还得把节点挂在美区才行。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">使用起来非常简单，你只需要把你想要学的东西的放在输入框里面。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">比如，歪师傅前段时间有三分钟热情想学吉他，但是我对于吉他属于一窍不通。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">那我在这里就输入：How to learn guitar?（如何学习吉他）</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">然后它就会给你一些选项：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112153733.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">都是英文的，怎么办？</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">前面不是给你说了嘛：沉浸式翻译。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">也就是这样的：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112153828.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这里的“互动列表”是可以点击的，比如我选择自学：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112154020.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">然后再次出现一个“互动列表”，从选吉他开始，到学习基本和弦，再到慢慢练习：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112154221.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">此外，它还会给你提供相应的视频，供你观看：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112154522.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">youtube 的都是英文怎么办？</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">沉浸式翻译给你保驾护航：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112154659.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">对于它给的回答，你也可以让它简化一点，或者更深一步：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112154748.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">我只是用吉他来举例，你当然可以用它来学习你想要学习的任何东西，包括但不限于技术领域。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">再举一个例子，比如我对于“鸿蒙编程”，仅限于听说过这个词，但是具体是什么一点都不了解。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">怎么办？</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">不用怎么办，直接开问就行了。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这里还有一个使用“沉浸式插件”的小技巧。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">因为 Learn About 只支持英文，所以我们需要用英文提问。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">“沉浸式插件”支持你在输入中文之后，快速点击三次空格键，直接把中文翻译成英文。</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112203057.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">大概是这样的：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/0112005.gif" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">非常好用。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">把问题抛给 Learn About 之后，按照它给你的卡片，去点击就行了：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112160440.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250112160516.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">点击的过程，就是一个互动的过程，整个过程就是一个互动式学习的过程。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">我觉得对于陌生的知识点，扫个盲，学习个皮毛什么的，绰绰有余了。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">我认为 Learn About 它也属于沉浸式学习的一种。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">按照以前，如何你对一个陌生的东西感兴趣，大概率是在网上搜索很多信息出来，逐步了解。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">然而这些信息大多都杂乱，非常的碎片化，让自己应接不暇，很容易就走偏了。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">但是 Learn About 它会以这个“陌生的东西”为主线，把知识点串起来，让你不知不觉中，就能把碎片化的东西，拼成一个相对有序的结构。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">我觉得这个 AI 产品很好，再配上沉浸式翻译这个抓手，就是一套终身学习的组合拳，分享给你，我们拉通对其一下颗粒度，携手共建美好未来。</p>
</section>
